content:
For today's 3p ET meeting we'll take notes here. Please feel free to join in the discussion. https://join.freeconferencecall.com/fhir (meeting ID: FHIR)

Key docs for our call: Ballot Themes List with prioritized issues in red at the bottom; and Ballot Summary Spreadsheet with full ballot comments + dispositions so far.

Attendees:
- Josh Mandel (Verily, FHIR-I)
- Dan Gottlieb (Boston Children's)
- Dylan Mahalingam (MITRE)
- Keith Boone (GE)
- Kevin Shekleton (Cerner)
- Rob Scanlon (MITRE)
- Grahame Grieve (HL7)
- Isaac Vetter (Epic)
- Debbie Bucci (U.S. Department of Health & Human Services)
- Eric Haas (Health Data, Inc)

Topic #1 - Conformance Levels

Keith & Josh - background on the proposal
Debbie - clarification on if you support 1 (Patient Access) and 2 (EHR Integration), that implies 0 (SMART on FHIR)
Isaac - generally agree with the approach but we need to hash out particulars

(Discussion on particulars of the proposed levels)

Keith motioned (Isaac 2nd) for revised set of 4 capabilities: PASS 9 (for) 0 (abstain) 0 (against)
Minutes from this call are on the HL7 wiki at: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Infrastructure_Minutes_CC_20171109
